name: BALL SLAYER
description:
MADE IN 16 HOURS!!
Slay balls. SHOW THOSE BALLS WHO'S BOSS. Your the Ball SLayer!!!@ You think you'll let those balls beat you. NO YOU WON'T. YOU SHALL SLAY ALLLLL OF THE BALLS. ALL OF THEM!!!!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHA ALL OF THE BALLS!!!!!!!!!

MUSIC: https://shadowmane.itch.io/flamefxhighoctanesoundtrack
